section1.good_choice_reason1: provide a high amount of vitamins and contribute positively to your fruit intake
section1.good_choice_reason2: offer whole grains, which are nutritious and high in fiber

section2.user_goals: reduce added sugar, reduce sodium, and increase vegetable intake

goal_feedback.feedback_text: Great work! You made progress in reducing added sugar. This was due to not having many foods high in added sugars. However, Freshness Guaranteed 5" Chocolate Cake still contributed to added sugars.

Some choices this week didn’t align with your dietary goals. You purchased Great Value Grated Parmesan Cheese which didn’t contribute to your goal of reducing sodium because it has high sodium content.

Some choices this week didn’t align with your dietary goals. You purchased Great Value Spaghetti which didn’t contribute to your goal of increasing vegetable intake because it does not contain enough vegetables.

section3.fruits_explanation: The inclusion of Fresh Strawberries contributed to a high fruit score. Consuming fruits provides essential vitamins, minerals, and fiber, which are important for maintaining overall health. Keep up the good work!
section3.vegetables_explanation: Your score was low due to a lack of a variety of vegetables; the contribution mainly came from Great Value Spaghetti which is not vegetable-rich. Including more veggies can provide vitamins, fiber, and antioxidants which support a healthy diet. Try to add more diverse veggies next time!
section3.grains_explanation: Your selection included Great Value Rotini, contributing to a perfect score by providing whole grains. Whole grains are important for providing fiber and reducing the risk of chronic diseases. Keep up the excellent work!
section3.dairy_explanation: The dairy score was primarily contributed by Great Value Grated Parmesan Cheese but needs improvement as your intake was low. Dairy products can provide important nutrients such as calcium needed for bone health. Consider incorporating varied dairy options in the future.
section3.protein_explanation: You had a variety of proteins, including Great Value Large White Eggs, providing a balanced protein intake. High-quality proteins are crucial for muscle maintenance and development. Keep up the great selections!
section3.fattyacids_explanation: This score was achieved due to Great Value Frozen Raw Colossal Peeled Deveined Tail-on Shrimp, providing healthy fats that are beneficial for heart health. Excellent choices!

section4.refinedgrains_explanation: The presence of RITZ Bits Peanut Butter Sandwich Crackers contributed significantly to your refined grains score. Refined grains are lower in fiber and nutrients, possibly leading to blood sugar spikes. Consider opting for more whole grains.
section4.sodium_explanation: The sodium content in choices like Great Value Grated Parmesan Cheese was moderate. High sodium intake can lead to increased blood pressure and heart disease risk. Aim to choose low-sodium options moving forward.
section4.addedsugars_explanation: Your consumption of added sugars, mainly Freshness Guaranteed 5" Chocolate Cake, contributed to this score. High added sugar intake contributes to weight gain and dental issues. Keep working on reducing sugar presence!
section4.saturatedfats_explanation: You did an excellent job limiting foods high in saturated fats like Great Value Grated Parmesan Cheese. Limiting saturated fat is beneficial for heart health. Keep it up!

section5.recommendation1: Freshness Guaranteed 5" Chocolate Cake contributed to negative added sugars score. Next week try fresh fruit like apples or oranges to satisfy sweet cravings.
section5.recommendation2: Great Value Grated Parmesan Cheese contributed to negative sodium score. Next week try low-sodium cheese options or increase the use of herbs and spices for flavor.
section5.recommendation3: Great Value Spaghetti contributed to negative vegetable score. Next week try adding more colorful vegetables like bell peppers or broccoli to your meals.
